text.div:
ServiceRequestRequesterfamilySearchParameter

Parameter requester.family:string

Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ServiceRequestRequesterfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the Practitioner's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?requester:Practitioner.family={familyName}
